title: 1999/762/EC: Council Decision of 15 November 1999 amending Decision 91/666/EEC establishing Community reserves of foot-and-mouth disease vaccines
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 15 November 1999
amending Decision 91/666/EEC establishing Community reserves of foot-and-mouth disease vaccines
(1999/762/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
In paragraph 1 of Article 3 of Decision 91/666/EEC:
(a) the first and third indents shall be deleted;
(b) a new indent shall be added as follows:
"- any other establishment designated in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 10".
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 November 1999.
For the Council
The President
K. HEMILÄ
(1) Opinion delivered on 6 October 1999 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
(2) Opinion delivered on 20 October 1999 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
(3) OJ L 315, 26.11.1985, p. 11. Directive as last amended by Decision 92/380/EEC (OJ L 198, 17.7.1992, p. 54).
(4) OJ L 368, 31.12.1991, p. 21.
